name.en: CTP Standard SEPA Direct Debit Payment Resource

description.en:
extends the CTP Payment Resource with the standard fields for a direct debit payment in the single european payments area.
Supports traditional adressing but only IBAN+BIC must be supported by all integrations

label.en: Short reference code to appear as first item in the client's bank account. Must be unique across all payments with the given PSP. Should be globally unique.
Text to appear in the bank account statement in addition to the reference ID which defaults to the Order Number
Optional future execution time of the direct debit. Not guaranteed to be supported by all PSP API integrations.
Full Name of the Bank Account Holder
Full machine-read formatted IBAN (i.e. no spaces or separators).
Legacy Bank Code as conventional in the respective country (e.g. traditional BLZ in Germany).
Legacy Bank Branch Code as conventional in the respective country. Known to be necessary in FR, ES, FI, IT among others.
Legacy Bank Account as conventional in the respective country.
Legacy Check Digit as conventional in the respective country. Known to be necessary in FR and BE among others.
SEPA Mandate ID. Field can be used to optionally pre-set the Mandate ID if the Merchant has these capabilities. Filled with the actual mandate ID from PSP API. Not supported by all PSPs.
SEPA Mandate Signature Date. Fed back from the PSP. Not supported by all PSP implementations.
